message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $16,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000.
I understand you're on a bit of a budget, Bob, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?

I appreciate the compromise, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer.
